model.name: Model for cholesterol metabolism in the liver

notes.body:

vCard:ORG.vCard:Orgname: Humboldt-University Berlin, Institute for Theoretical Biology

body.p: reference values from studies (normal ranges ~3 mM)
5.8 - 160 [µmol/l] [Chuang2017]; mice ~ 8.17 [µmol/l] [Rudling1997]; rat reference point 0.020 with variation [0.01 - 0.100]
Species added for tracking degradation of LDLR.

parameter.name: HMG-CoA Reductase inhibitor activity of simmets
Protein synthesis Vmax for HMGR and HMGS
Protein degradation Vmax for HMGR and HMGS
Protein regulation kr for HMGR and HMGS
scaling factor for synthesis Vmax for LDL-R
scaling factor for degradation Vmax for LDL-R
total loss of cholesterol in the feces
active HMG-CoA reductase inhbitors in liver
rate of cholesterol uptake from diet
rate of cholesterol loss in feces

body.p: Set to 3mM for reference state of 3mM in healthy patient as 3mM plasma LDL-C.

parameter.name: Ki HMG-CoA for simvastatin acid and simvastatin metabolites
